name: Flipping
description:
Welcome to Flipping!

We have a job for you. What is this job you ask? Well, flip.

What else would it be - Duh!

Use the power of your mouse and keyboard to flip, we won't say too much more other than that: flip. 

Hope you enjoy your time flipping for us.

Disclaimer: No people, animals, or objects were hurt in the flipping of them.  We are not responsible for any uncontrollable addiction to flipping, play at your own discretion and risk flipping out. 

[Made for ACM GameJam 2021]

Design, art, and audio were all by us during the GameJam. 

Game was made with Unity.

Danna Scherer @amazingdanna

Daivd Zhou @Leycia
